wblut.geom

Class WB_CoordinateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.geom.WB_CoordinateUtil

  • public class WB_CoordinateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    WB_CoordinateUtil contains convenience functions for doing calculations on coordinates.
